response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would greatly enhance your endeavors and contribute significantly to your success. This product holds immense value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. Given its importance, I am confident it will also be a valuable asset to you.

I am extending to you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive a significant discount compared to its market value, while still allowing me to recoup a substantial portion of its worth.

Please consider this proposal carefully. I am here to answer any questions or provide additional information you might need to make an informed decision. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this product into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
